translations: 阿米巴，变形虫（amoeba 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Inside the slug, about 1 percent of the amoebas turn into police.
sentences.translation: 在鼻涕虫体内，大约1%的阿米巴原虫变成了警察。

sentences.sentence: When the slug is ready to make a stalk, more amoebas must die so that others can live.
sentences.translation: 当鼻涕虫准备好要形成柄时，会有更多的阿米巴原虫必须死去，这样其他的才能存活。

sentences.sentence: Amoebas are too small to see.
sentences.translation: 变形虫羸小而目所难及。
